page.title: 19ATTITUDES,HOUSING,FACILITIES
page.content: On the last two pages of our Domesday Project we decided to write about what people think about the area we have descibed on the pages before. Most people thought that living in the area as a whole was quite good. Here are some of the things that they mentioned. Some think that Rathcoole Estate is all right while others think it is spoiled by graffiti and some rundown houses. Shopping at{Abbey Centre}is very good as well as{Abbots Cross. } The{Valley Leisure Centre}is very good although not everyone goes to it regularly. {Schools}are thought to be quite good while the{Hospital}and{Health {Centre}are not so well thought of. {Parks}are reasonably good and there are open areas to play in.
